text: Lofa County is a county in Liberia. The county is bordered by Bong County to the south and Gbarpolu County to the west. The northwestern parts of Lofa border the nation of Sierra Leone. The northeastern parts border Guinea. Mount Wuteve, the highest mountain in Liberia, is in the county. Category:Counties Category:1964 establishments in Africa Category:Geography of Liberia
title: Lofa County
